title: Login Issues OCE
body:
Anyone else having issues logging in to league or searching for a game and accepting?

Tried to play a game of TFT with 4 other people and all of us kept getting either the Match Accept screen stuck on the screen and everyone else dropping out with the game saying they had failed to accept, or, "failed to display Ready Check" shows in the notification area.

Also tried to log out and log in however got told there was a queue to log into league...

Sad Times.

replies.body:
Hey folks

We saw an issue that looks to affect some ISPs in OCE, and is causing login /champ select / other client issues for a subset of players.  

I'll post another update when we have more information, or in the next hour (whichever is sooner).

Mindstar

Hi again

Can any of you confirm if you are still unable to get in game?

Mindstar
Yeah it just fell over about an hour ago and has been almost unusable since
I'm having trouble with logging in as well. My league is bugged I probably need to wait on the update
